question: I am a 44 year old housewife, in India. I have type 2 diabetes and the present count is 120 (pp).I lost my father to Parkinsons disease last month. Is this disease hereditary?I am of late, having very slight loss of balance and very slight tremors in my hands. I also twitch in my sleep. Am very worried.Pls adviseRegards Jayanthi Ganesh
title: tremors and loss of balance
